translations: 作苦工（slave 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: I've been slaving away all day trying to get this work finished.
sentences.translation: 我整天苦干，想把这项工作赶完。

sentences.sentence: He stares at the hundreds of workers slaving away in the intense sun.
sentences.translation: 他凝视着几百个正在烈日下苦干的工人们。

sentences.sentence: When you're busy all day the last thing you want to do is spend hours slaving over a hot stove.
sentences.translation: 当你忙碌了一整天后，你最不愿意做的事就是花好几个钟头在灼热的火炉边辛苦地劳作。
